Crimes.Dispute_Type: Judicial review of humanitarian and compassionate application refusal
Crimes.Legal_Issue: Breach of procedural fairness due to inadequate reasons
Crimes.Procedural_Context: Humanitarian and compassionate grounds application under subsection 25(1)
Crimes.Credibility_Assessment: Wife's concealment of marriage affected credibility
Crimes.Evidence_Type: Immigration application records, marital status documentation
Crimes.Basis_of_Claim: Alleged insufficient reasoning in refusal decision
Crimes.Decision_Maker: Minister of Immigration, Refugees and Citizenship
Crimes.Application_Error: Failure to disclose prior marriage in immigration documents
Crimes.Evidence_Ignored: None identified – applicant did not request clarification
Crimes.Decision_Review_Issue: Adequacy of reasons in administrative decision
Crimes.Outcome_of_Review: No breach of procedural fairness found
Crimes.Cause_of_Refusal: Misrepresentation by Mr. Za'Rour's wife regarding her marriage
Crimes.Evidentiary_Issues: Lack of request for further explanation from applicant
Crimes.Procedural_Fairness: No breach found due to functional reasons and lack of prejudice
Crimes.Document_Fraud: Concealment of marital status in immigration documents
Crimes.Credibility_Issues: Wife’s failure to disclose marriage during immigration process
Crimes.Legal_Defense_or_Challenge: Claim of procedural unfairness based on brevity of reasons
Crimes.Procedural_Issue: Sufficiency of written reasons for administrative decision
Crimes.Omission_Type: Failure to disclose material personal information

Crimes.Crime_Name: Failure to disclose marriage before becoming a permanent resident
Crimes.Dispute_Type: Judicial review of humanitarian and compassionate application refusal
Crimes.Legal_Issue: Breach of procedural fairness due to inadequate reasons
Crimes.Procedural_Context: Humanitarian and compassionate grounds application under subsection 25(1)
Crimes.Credibility_Assessment: Applicant’s spouse concealed marriage during immigration
Crimes.Evidence_Type: Immigration application records, marital status documentation
Crimes.Basis_of_Claim: Alleged insufficient reasoning in refusal decision
Crimes.Key_Factor_in_Determination: Non-disclosure of marriage prior to permanent residency
Crimes.Decision_Maker: Minister of Immigration, Refugees and Citizenship
Crimes.Application_Error: Failure to disclose existing marriage before obtaining permanent resident status
Crimes.Evidence_Ignored: None identified – applicant did not seek further clarification
Crimes.Decision_Review_Issue: Adequacy of reasons in administrative decision
Crimes.Outcome_of_Review: No breach of procedural fairness found
Crimes.Cause_of_Refusal: Mrs. Audisho concealed her marriage during immigration process
Crimes.Evidentiary_Issues: No evidence of prejudice from brief reasons
Crimes.Procedural_Fairness: No breach found; reasons were functionally adequate
Crimes.Document_Fraud: Intentional omission of marital status in immigration forms
Crimes.Credibility_Issues: Spouse’s lack of transparency about marital history
Crimes.Legal_Defense_or_Challenge: Argument that reasons were too brief to allow meaningful review
Crimes.Procedural_Issue: Sufficiency of written reasons for administrative decision
Crimes.Omission_Type: Failure to disclose material personal information
